title: Tales of Zestiria Collector's Edition Unboxing
description:
Colin has the latest Tales collector's edition, but what's inside? 

Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get your PC here: http://www.ORIGINPC.com

Each and every day, Tim Gettys, Greg Miller, and Colin Moriarty get together to talk videogames. 

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

Music by Rakohus!: http://www.youtube.com/user/rakohus

transcript_chunks.text: greetings and salutations welcome to Kinda Funny Games My name is Colin Moriarty now many of you out there might know that I'm a huge fan of the Tales series from Bandai Namco and our friends at Bandai Namco sent me a collector's edition of the brand new Tales game Tales of Zestiria and as you can see on the top I am 1st of 20,000 there's only 20,000 these in the world and so I thought I'd open them do a little unboxing for you in the style of a normal Kinda Funny unboxing which is to say a little bit silly and a little bit zany so the one thing I want to point out before I even unbox it is I like that Bandai Namco smart enough and cognizant enough to keep their Collector's Edition for the Tales games the same size so the Symphonia one for instance and the Xillia 2 one um they're all the same size you can put them on the Shelf next to each other I actually quite enjoy that and I appreciate that but let's open up the plastic and get this this box out see if we can do it just just

the same size you can put them on the shelf next to each other I actually quite enjoy that and I appreciate that but let's open up the plastic and get this this box out see if we can do it just just going to kind of give it a little shake I don't know I'm going to am I going to break it Greg you think I'm going to break it if I give a sh no I'll be all right it's it's in this plastic sheath let me see if I can grab it I'm going to palm it oh yeah there we go so it comes out like this as you can see here and then it's basically just got like the back of the box kind of stuff here as opposed to like some beautiful art over it here um so then we'll open it up and we'll see what's inside all right so most importantly the game Tales of Zestiria on PlayStation 4 on Blu-ray uh interestingly not for resale on the back because it is the special edition one I guess uh let's see 13 GB install one to four players of course you can that's an old Tales thing you can play with a up to four players in
